wikipedia_page.main: George Thomas Atkinson was an English footballer who represented Great Britain as a center half at the 1920 Summer Olympics. He also played for Bishop Auckland throughout his career.

response: *George Atkinson (Surveyor General), Surveyor General of Ceylon appointed in 1805

*George Atkinson (Olympic footballer), represented Great Britain at the 1920 Summer Olympics

George Atkinson (fl. 1904–1905) was an English professional footballer who played as a winger.
